entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Mississauga
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:07 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with snow near noon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to 12 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to 12 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 13 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High 13 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
